blogPost.excerpt: In case you haven't (jk, everyone has heard)... --------- Simple site showing which brokerages are allowing/blocking trading for certain apps so you figure out where you want to move your money too
blogPost.body: In case you haven't (jk, everyone has heard)... --------- Simple site showing which brokerages are allowing/blocking trading for certain apps so you figure out where you want to move your money too
blogPost.title: Can I Trade It? - Which brokerages let you trade $GME, $NOK, $BB, $AMC, etc..
blogPost.author: Connor Van Ooyen

localize.description: 如果你没有(jk，大家都听说过)... ... --------- 简单的网站，显示哪些经纪公司允许/阻止某些应用程序的交易，这样你就可以弄清楚你想把你的钱也转移到哪里去。
localize.tagline: 哪些券商可以让你交易$GME，$NOK，$BB，$AMC等。

localize.description: 如果你沒有(jk，大家都聽說過)... ... --------- 簡單的網站，顯示哪些經紀公司允許/阻止某些應用程序的交易，這樣你就可以弄清楚你想把你的錢也轉移到哪裏去。
localize.tagline: 哪些券商可以讓你交易$GME，$NOK，$BB，$AMC等。

previous.excerpt: Add OAuth integrations to your Bubble.io app instantly with no-code plugins built by Pathfix. Pathfix plugins handle the entire OAuth process and gives you instant access to provider Actions, without API or endpoint complexity.
previous.title: Bubble Integration Plugins by Pathfix - Add OAuth integrations to your Bubble.io app, instantly

localize.description: 通过Pathfix构建的无代码插件，可以立即为你的Bubble.io应用添加OAuth集成。Pathfix插件处理整个OAuth过程，并让你立即访问提供者的行为，没有API或终端的复杂性。
localize.tagline: 将OAuth集成到你的Bubble.io应用中，即刻就能实现。

localize.description: 通過Pathfix構建的無代碼插件，可以立即爲你的Bubble.io應用添加OAuth集成。Pathfix插件處理整個OAuth過程，並讓你立即訪問提供者的行爲，沒有API或終端的複雜性。
localize.tagline: 將OAuth集成到你的Bubble.io應用中，即刻就能實現。

next.excerpt: A perfectly rounded icon library made for designers, developers, and pretty much everyone. They are free to use and open source.
next.title: Akar Icons - Perfectly rounded icon library for your projects.

localize.description: 一个为设计师、开发者以及几乎所有人打造的完美圆润的图标库。它们是免费使用和开源的。
localize.tagline: 为您的项目提供完美的圆形图标库。

localize.description: 一個爲設計師、開發者以及幾乎所有人打造的完美圓潤的圖標庫。它們是免費使用和開源的。
localize.tagline: 爲您的項目提供完美的圓形圖標庫。
